casebody.data:
NC ASS'N OF EDUCATORS, INC., et al.
v.
STATE of NC. No. 228A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, for The State of North Carolina. Burton Craige, Raleigh, for North Carolina Association of Educators, Inc., et al. Narendra Ghosh, Chapel Hill, for North Carolina Association of Educators, Inc., et al. Philip A. Hostak, for North Carolina Association of Educators, Inc., et al. John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General, for The State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of July 2015 by Plaintiff-Appellee Philip A. Hostak for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
